items.name: AM:PM
items.desc:
Why not make up your own case?
AM:PM is a session IPA, allowing you to enjoy all the flavours and body of an IPA at a lower ABV.
Bags of tropical fruit aromas, pineapple, tangerine, guava and passion fruit are balanced with a chewy, honeyed malt character.
ABV 4.5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS  Ella / Citra / Nelson Sauvin / Amarillo
MALTS Maris Otter / Munich / Crystal
NOTABLE AWARDS
2018 - SIBA National Independent Beer Awards, March Gold – Bottled Premium Bitters & Pale Ales
2017 - SIBA Midlands Beer Awards, November - Overall Champion Bottled Beer
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.
The minimum order quantity for Pick and Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof, without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.
Please note: Any bottles of AM:PM with a Best Before date of 05/05/2021 and later are now Gluten Free.

items.name: Carry Us All
items.desc:
Carry us all has been brewed as part of our ‘Year of Beer’ range for 2020. It is a light
and hoppy table beer overflowing with flavours of peach, tangerine and lychee.
ABV 2.5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS  Sabro / Citra / Amarillo / Bru-1
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat / Carapils / Munich
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.
The minimum order quantity for Pick and Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof, without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.

items.name: Cocoa Wonderland
items.desc:
A full bodied, robust porter with natural mocha malt flavours from the complex malt grist, complementing the decadent additions of real chocolate to the maturation process.
ABV 6.8% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Magnum
MALTS Pale / Munich / Brown / Crystal / Wheat / Black
SPECIALTY Cacao Nibs
NOTABLE AWARDS

items.name: Colorado Red
items.desc:

items.name: Florida Weisse
items.desc:
A hazy and refreshing fruit sour that is bracingly tart. It pours with a pinkish hue and is absolutely brimming with the flavour of fresh raspberries. This product is Vegan friendly.
ABV 4.5% / 330ml can
HOPS None
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat
SPECIALTY Raspberries

items.name: Green Mountain
items.desc:
A beautiful hazy Vermont Session IPA. We generously dry hop with Galaxy, Mosaic, Citra and Amarillo hops, creating a hugely aromatic and juicy fruit bomb. This product is vegan friendly.
ABV 4.3% / 330ml can
Hops Galaxy / Mosaic / Citra / Amarillo
Malts Pale / Wheat / Caramalt

items.name: Little By Little
items.desc:
This dark and indulgent low alcohol milk stout beer combines light flavours of coffee with a roasted, creamy mouthfeel. At just 0.5% it's perfect if you’re cutting back on the booze in January.
ABV 0.5%
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.

items.name: Lukas
items.desc:
Lukas in cans, the perfect fridge filler.
Helles is a traditional, elegant Bavarian style of beer originating in Munich. Lukas is straw blonde, full-bodied yet sparklingly light.

HOPS Hallertauer
MALTS Pale / Carapils / Wheat

items.name: Shelby - The Official Beer of the TV Series
items.desc:
The official beer of Peaky Blinders the TV series. Shelby is an India Pale Ale inspired by the style of beer consumed in 1919, at the time of The Peaky Blinders.
Shelby pours a golden amber in colour with a nose of stone fruit and red berries, a gentle maltiness on the palate and a wonderful citrusy lemon bitterness.
By Order of The Shelby Company LTD
ABV 5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Fuggles / Bramling Cross
MALTS Maris Otter/ Crystal / Munich
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.
The minimum order quantity for Pick and Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof, without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.

items.name: Zero Five
items.desc:
Please be aware that we have changed Big Easy to Zero Five. The beer is exactly the same and you can read more about why we have changed the name by clicking here.
Low Alcohol Pale Ale
Full of flavour but low in alcohol.
Zero Five overflows with sublime American hops which produce a beautiful bouquet of lemon, peach and apricot.
ABV 0.5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS  Amarillo / Cascade
MALTS Pale Ale / Crystal / Munich
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.
The minimum order quantity for Pick and Mix is 12 beers and multiples thereof, without 12 beers or a multiple thereof in your cart your order will not be shipped.
Please be aware that during the process of re-branding you may receive a bottle with a label different to the illustration, this will not be reflective of beer quality or flavour.
